characters.name: Dr. Moscola
characters.description: A computer science professor at York College of Pennsylvania who hates the Windows operating system and is great with low-level programming.

characters.name: Dr. Babcock
characters.description: The chair of the computer science department, and professor at York College of Pennsylvania who loves his Mac and going to Azteca, a Mexian restaurant for lunch. He also drives a Tesla.

characters.name: Prof. Zeller
characters.description: A computer science professor at York College of Pennsylvania who loves fire spinning and talking about the ethical uses of AI. He also enjoys writing scripts.

characters.name: Prof. Hake
characters.description: A professor at York College of Pennsylvania who has a large amount of industry experience. He loves to preach about his bluetooth bowling ball project, as well as driving his Tesla.
